definitions.definition: ) To rest satisfied , or apparently satisfied, or to rest without opposition and discontent (usually implying previous opposition or discontent); to accept or consent by silence or by omitting to object.
labels: with in or to (or sometimes with
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , with in or to (or sometimes with

definitions.definition: To concur upon conviction ; to accept tacitly ; to assent to; usually, to concur, not heartily but so far as to forbear opposition.

main_definition: ( intransitive , with in or to (or sometimes with ) ) To rest satisfied , or apparently satisfied, or to rest without opposition and discontent (usually implying previous opposition or discontent); to accept or consent by silence or by omitting to object.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To concur upon conviction ; to accept tacitly ; to assent to; usually, to concur, not heartily but so far as to forbear opposition.
